Jekyll Netlify Boilerplate

Welcome

Jekyll Netlify Boilerplate provides the basics to get a fast, static website deployed on Netlify. Features Netlify CMS, responsive CSS Grid layout, sample pages and posts, and a continuous deployment workflow.
